sections.heading: Overview
content:
Susan Marie Nedza, MD, FACEP, is a member of the American College of
Emergency Physicians (ACEP) "Task Force on Health Care and the Uninsured
and chair of ACEP's State Legislative and Regulatory Committee. She also is
past president of the Illinois College of Emergency Physicians and represents
ACEP to the American Medical Association (AMA). The AMA and Glaxo Wellcome
recently named her one of 50 emerging leaders in organized medicine. Nedza is a
staff physician at Elmhurst Memorial Hospital in Elmhurst, Ill., and a member
of the clinical faculty at Christ Hospital and Medical Center in Oak Lawn, Ill.
She also serves as the EMS medical consultant to the Illinois Department of
Public Health.
